text: Theatre on the Bay is a theatre in Camps Bay, Cape Town, South Africa. Pieter Toerien converted the building into a theatre in the 1980s. It opened in December 1988 with a production of Dan Goggin's Nunsense. Toerien's theatre hosts a mix of local and international drama, concerts, comedies, and dance. == External links == * Official website == References == Category:Buildings and structures in Cape Town Category:Theatres in South Africa
title: Theatre on the Bay
